name: Raynor
title: Renegade Commander
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Penetrating Round
abilities.description: Deals 240 damage and knocks enemies back.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Gain 30% bonus Attack Speed for 6 seconds. Nearby allies gain half of the bonus.

abilities.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilities.description: Automatically activates to heal for 440 when Raynor is below 30% Health.

heroics.name: Hyperion
heroics.description: Order the Hyperion to make a strafing run dealing 66 damage a second, hitting up to 4 enemies. Also occasionally fires its Yamato Cannon on Structures for 794 damage. Lasts 12 seconds.

heroics.name: Raynor's Raiders
heroics.description: Summon two Stealthed Banshees that attack an enemy. Each Banshee deals 50 damage a second and lasts 22 seconds. Can reactivate the Ability to retarget the Banshees.

original.name: Raynor
original.title: Renegade Commander
original.description: Ex-Confederate Marshal James Raynor has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.
original.shortDescription: A Physical Damage Assassin that can keep enemies away.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Advanced Optics
trait.description: Raynor's Basic Attack range is 1 further than most other ranged Heroes, and his vision radius is 1 further as well.

skins.name: Renegade Commander
skins.description: Ex-Confederate Marshal James Raynor has stood against whatever the universe can throw at him and survived. He stands as a beacon of hope among enigmatic aliens and monsters, fighting for justice in a cold uncaring universe.

skins.name: Special Ordnance Raynor
skins.description: A small yellow note stuck to the inside says, "Hey, cowboy. Thought that suit of yours could use an upgrade or two, you can thank me later. -Swann"

skins.name: Marshal Raynor
skins.description: Once the Confederacy mined Mar Sara dry of resources, the colonists became desperate. Marshal James E. Raynor found himself alone, trying to keep the peace on a world in chaos.

skins.name: Commander Raynor
skins.description: Some days it's good to get out of the CMC Powered Combat Suit and into something a bit more comfortable.

skins.name: Stars and Stripes Raynor
skins.description: While the United States Space Force successfully rescued their colonists from the Koprulu sector, Colonel Raynor worried those monsters might find their way to Earth.
